text: "Wake Me Up Before You Go-Go" is a 1984 song by English pop duo Wham! and is taken from their second studio album Make It Big. It became their first number-one hit in the United Kingdom and the United States. Then it went to number 1 in Australia, Belgium, Ireland, Canada, the Netherlands, Norway and Sweden. == References == Category:1984 songs Category:Pop songs Category:Wham! songs
title: Wake Me Up Before You Go-Go
